title: Adjective collection 1
sentences: The house is very big and has many windows.
My new phone is quite small.
Is the car new or used?
This old watch is a beautiful gift.
The weather today is really bad.
I find this movie very interesting.
The homework is not difficult today.
Der Weg zum Bahnhof ist sehr
The path to the station is very short.
This coffee is too hot for me.
Im Winter ist es in Deutschland oft
In winter it is often cold in Germany.
Are you satisfied with the work?
I am a bit tired today.
The child is very happy today.
The street here is very narrow.
Are you ready for the exam?
The book is unfortunately very boring.
My brother is a very funny person.
Is the water in the pool warm?
I am wearing a white shirt today.
The table is dirty, we have to clean it.
In meinem Zimmer ist es immer
It is always clean in my room.

leicht - light / easy
kurz - short
lang - long

kalt - cold
warm - warm

müde - tired
traurig - sad
glücklich - happy
lustig - funny
hoch - high / tall

breit - wide
